tests.name: array of strings, default value
tests.template: {% assign b = a | reject: 'c' %}{% for obj in b %}{{ obj }}, {% endfor %}

tests.name: array containing null, default value
tests.template: {{ a | reject: 'c' }}

tests.name: array containing an int, default value
tests.template: {{ a | reject: 'c' }}

tests.name: array of hashes, default value
tests.template: {% assign b = a | reject: 'title' %}{% for obj in b %}{% for itm in obj %}({{ itm[0] }},{{ itm[1] }}), {% endfor %}{% endfor %}

tests.name: array of hashes, explicit nil
tests.template: {% assign b = a | reject: 'title', nil %}{% for obj in b %}{% for itm in obj %}({{ itm[0] }},{{ itm[1] }}), {% endfor %}{% endfor %}

tests.name: array of hashes, explicit false
tests.template: {% assign b = a | reject: 'title', false %}{% for obj in b %}{% for itm in obj %}({{ itm[0] }},{{ itm[1] }}), {% endfor %}{% endfor %}

tests.name: array of hashes, explicit true
tests.template: {% assign b = a | reject: 'title', true %}{% for obj in b %}{% for itm in obj %}({{ itm[0] }},{{ itm[1] }}), {% endfor %}{% endfor %}

tests.name: array of hashes, string value
tests.template: {% assign b = a | reject: 'title', 'bar' %}{% for obj in b %}{% for itm in obj %}({{ itm[0] }},{{ itm[1] }}), {% endfor %}{% endfor %}

tests.name: array of hashes, missing property
tests.template: {% assign b = a | reject: 'title', 'bar' %}{% for obj in b %}{% for itm in obj %}({{ itm[0] }},{{ itm[1] }}), {% endfor %}{% endfor %}

tests.name: missing argument
tests.template: {% assign b = a | reject %}{% for obj in b %}{{ obj }}, {% endfor %}

tests.name: too many arguments
tests.template: {% assign b = a | reject: 'x', 'y', 'z' %}{% for obj in b %}{{ obj }}, {% endfor %}

tests.name: input is undefined
tests.template: {% assign b = nosuchthing | reject: 'c' %}{% for obj in b %}{{ obj }}, {% endfor %}

tests.name: first argument is undefined
tests.template: {% assign b = a | reject: nosuchthing %}{% for obj in b %}{{ obj }}, {% endfor %}

tests.name: second argument is undefined
tests.template: {% assign b = a | reject: 'title', nosuchthing %}{% for obj in b %}{% for itm in obj %}({{ itm[0] }},{{ itm[1] }}), {% endfor %}{% endfor %}

tests.name: input is a hash, default value
tests.template: {% assign b = h | reject: 'bar' %}{% for obj in b %}{{ obj }}, {% endfor %}

tests.name: input is a hash, default value, no match
tests.template: {% assign b = h | reject: 'barbar' %}{% for obj in b %}{% for itm in obj %}({{ itm[0] }},{{ itm[1] }}), {% endfor %}{% endfor %}

tests.name: input is a hash, default value, nil match
tests.template: {% assign b = h | reject: 'bar' %}{% for obj in b %}{% for itm in obj %}({{ itm[0] }},{{ itm[1] }}), {% endfor %}{% endfor %}

tests.name: input is a hash, explicit nil match
tests.template: {% assign b = h | reject: 'bar', nil %}{% for obj in b %}{% for itm in obj %}({{ itm[0] }},{{ itm[1] }}), {% endfor %}{% endfor %}

tests.name: input is a hash, int value, no match
tests.template: {% assign b = h | reject: 'bar', 1 %}{% for obj in b %}{% for itm in obj %}({{ itm[0] }},{{ itm[1] }}), {% endfor %}{% endfor %}

tests.name: input is a hash, int value, match
tests.template: {% assign b = h | reject: 'bar', 2 %}{% for obj in b %}{% for itm in obj %}({{ itm[0] }},{{ itm[1] }}), {% endfor %}{% endfor %}

tests.name: nested array of hashes gets flattened
tests.template: {% assign b = a | reject: 'title', 'bar' %}{% for obj in b %}{% for itm in obj %}({{ itm[0] }},{{ itm[1] }}), {% endfor %}{% endfor %}

tests.name: string input becomes a single element array, substring match
tests.template: {% assign b = s | reject: 'oo' %}{% for obj in b %}{{ obj }}, {% endfor %}

tests.name: string input becomes a single element array, no match
tests.template: {% assign b = s | reject: 'xx' %}{% for obj in b %}{{ obj }}, {% endfor %}
